field.label: Number of positions held in the past 2 years?
Are there any outstanding judgements against you?
Are you a party to any current lawsuit?
Are you presently delinquent or in default on any loan, or title transfer?
Have you ever been obligated to any loan which resulted in foreclosure?
Have any of your properties been foreclosed upon?
Are you obligated to pay alimony, child support or separate maintenance obligations?
Are you the maker or co-maker on endorser on a note?
Do you plan on occupying the property as your primary residence?
Will any part of the down payment be borrowed?

action.label: if first time going through wizard

skuid__text.contents:
• Render fields only when necessary
    • In Step 1, select Multi Family under Property Type to add units
  • Conditional rendering/enabling fields
    • Step 2: Insurance amount is hidden until Insurance included in escrow? is checked
  • Calculate fields like Down Payment, Loan Amount, etc.
  • Placeholder text
    • Step 1: Apt/Suite
  • Inline Help Text
    • Step 3: Hover over Social Security label for help text
  • Validation 
    • Step 1: Next button not enabled until Property Use field is complete
    • Step 3: Try adding more than 3 borrowers
